subject: Simplify code with code-simplifier agent
description:
**Type:** Task

**Description:** Run code-simplifier agent on the changed files to ensure clean, maintainable code.

**Acceptance Criteria:**
- [ ] Code simplifier run on modified files
- [ ] Any simplification suggestions applied

**Skills to Invoke:** `/coding-philosophy`

**Verification:**
- Type: test
- Command: `bun test -- tests/unit/config/jest-base.test.ts`
- Expected: All tests pass after simplification

learnings: Single-line array addition is already at optimal simplicity - no further simplification possible
